about_the_game:
Game Title: Capri Care

Embark on an enchanting journey to the vibrant Wild Isle, where you’ll encounter the adorable and mysterious creatures known as Capri! These playful, colorful beings are waiting for you to care for, train, and interact with them in a world full of endless fun.

Core Gameplay:

  • Interactive Capri: Get to know your Capri, each with its own personality, traits, and appearance. Build a bond with these creatures through love and care as you feed them fruit, play with them, and nurture their growth. The more attention you give, the more your Capri will thrive—boosting their stats and abilities for exciting adventures ahead.

  • Minigames Galore: Take your Capri on thrilling adventures through a variety of fun and competitive minigames. Race through challenging foot races, compete in tug-of-war matches, and search for hidden treasures in the island’s wild terrain! Each minigame is a chance to level up your Capri, unlock special abilities, and win rewards.

  • Breeding and Colors: Discover the art of Capri breeding! Breed your creatures to unlock new, unique color patterns, and create even more adorable companions. Experiment with different pairings to discover rare genetic traits and create the ultimate Capri collection.

  • Fishing and Exploration: Explore the lush environments of the Wild Isle, from its sandy beaches to lush forests and mysterious caves. Grab your fishing rod and cast into sparkling waters to catch rare fish, which you can use to boost your Capri’s stats or simply enjoy the serenity of nature.

  • Feed and Grow: Feed your Capri fruits, creatures, and special items to enhance their abilities. Each food has a different effect—some increase speed, others improve strength, and more. Manage your resources wisely to create the most powerful team of Capri.

  • Customization and Growth: Customize your Capri's appearance and stats, watch them evolve, and train them for ultimate success in both competitions and exploration. Develop strategies to take on the island’s various challenges, unlock new areas, and meet even more adorable creatures.

Features:

  • Fun and vibrant art style with adorable Capri creatures.

  • Diverse minigames including foot races, tug-of-war, treasure hunts, and more.

  • Breeding system to create new colors and unique traits.

  • A vast, explorable world filled with hidden surprises and challenges.

  • Collect rare items and food to enhance your Capri’s growth.

  • A relaxing and playful experience perfect for all ages.

Dive into the world of Capri Care and discover the joy of building your own creature family, competing with friends, and exploring a magical world full of surprises!

Key Features:

  • Engaging minigames and interactive play.

  • Customizable Capri creatures with unique stats.

  • A vibrant and relaxing world to explore and enjoy.

  • Endless possibilities for breeding, training, and nurturing your Capri.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 8500
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Capri Care

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i9-9900K 3.6 GHz 8 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Capri Care lets you care for and interact with adorable Capri creatures. Compete in fun minigames, breed new colors and traits, and explore a vibrant island. Feed, train, and bond with your Capri to unlock new adventures and surprises in this magical world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
